Package NationMania.core

NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Class for settings all Constant values of the game.
    Fact
    This is a data structure that holds relevant information for the game about all the facts of the current and next randomized state.
    It contains a unique ID, weight parameter to determine it's difficulty, and name, type and relation,
    which combined together builds the fact string.
    Game
    This class containing all data needed for managing a full game, and keeping statistics for saving in the player's history.
    The fields used for managing are the game difficulty, and the fields next state and next fact.
    The fields game ID, total score, number of states discovered and the map gameNationsAndFacts that contains all the nations and
    facts that appeared in the game, uses for keeping statistics which will be considered on later games.
    Nations
    Static class holds list of all the states in the DB, and the functions related to their randomization algorithm.
    The nations list will be filled only on startup, unless a DB update will be preformed.
    Player
    Static Class containing all the information needed about the logged user.
    Round
    Class containing all data for current round (one round = one state)
    The data is only valid for the current game with the current player
    SortedFacts
    Class for dividing nation facts to buckets based on fact weight for better randomization
    Each bin contains a different range of difficulties.
    The bins are ordered from the hardest facts to the easiest
    The randomization of every fact is divided to 2 steps:
    1.
    SortedFacts.List  
    State
    Class that holds basic information for every state.
    If the State has been randomized during a game, it contains all it's related facts from the DB, ordered and divided to buckets

Package NationMania.core Description

NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.
